ComicInfo.Summary:
With the legendary Runescar Stylus in the hands of the enemy, the race is on to stop a rogue Hellknight from waking an army of undead sorcerers and drowning Varisia in the blood of the innocent! Can Seoni and her team of adventurers overcome Lazku’s devils—and their own fears—in order to stop the atrocity before it begins? Monsters and madness abound in the triumphant conclusion of the Runescars series, from Pathfinder co-creators James L. Sutter and F. Wesley Schneider, with art by Ediano Silva.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Jonathan Lau | 1 | B | Cover B | Pasquale Qualano | 2 | C | Cover C | Andrea Mutti | 3 | D/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Jonathan Lau | 4 | E/RE | Paizo.com Exclusive Variant Cover | ? | 5 |
